Name: IN THE BUILDING: CATS 2
About the game: IN THE BUILDING: CATS 2 is a game where you have to find all the cute cats. Cats will hide in all apartments of a multi-storey building. Search every corner of the room, move the pillows, open the nightstands, check the toilet.... Cats can hide in the most unpredictable places. In the second part of the game, you have to search not only the large hall and bathroom, but also the bedroom. Key features: 5 floors; 265 cats; Bonus level - roof; Hints; During the development of this game, we were motivated by the game ' A Building Full of Cats '.
